author: alex.g.t
content: now that medalla is almost dead... will zinken be available for longer?

author: alex.g.t

author: djrtwo
content:
Both can run as long as people choose. 
I don't think there is much appetite to "save" medalla right now with client teams working deeply on mainnet preparations. That said, Medalla continuing forward in a stressful state is actually probably a good thing at this point

Maybe I'll make some deposits into zinken to strengthen its numbers...

author: alex.g.t
content: ok, i ll do the same over the weekend or next week, thanks danny
